MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer is still ongoing. This is due to digging difficulties onsite and we now expect power to be back on by 2.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.58pm on 26th October 2020.
